title: Works well with iPhone X
text:
It works well with my iPhone X.  It starts the machine, runs a diagnostic, provides information about specific cycles. It even has a suggested cycle based on things you input like fabric type. Setup is a little clunky. 

My only real complaint is that they have a 100% custom interface that doesn‚Äôt use standard iOS buttons/flows or follow Apple‚Äôs Human Interface Guidelines. The result is an app that feels like somebody cares a lot about it, but doesn‚Äôt have Apple‚Äôs expertise at producing user interfaces. 

Overall I recommend it.
